name: Running Shoes
description: Lightweight, breathable running shoes with advanced cushioning for maximum comfort on long-distance runs.

name: TrailBlazer Boots
description: Durable, waterproof hiking boots designed for rugged terrain. Excellent ankle support and grip.

name: QuantumCore Laptop 14"
description: Ultra-slim and powerful laptop with a 12th-gen processor, 16GB RAM, and a 1TB SSD. Ideal for professionals.

name: Laptop Keyboard
description: A quiet mechanical keyboard with tactile feedback and customizable RGB lighting. Great for gaming and typing.

name: The Alchemist's Secret
description: A thrilling fantasy novel about a young scribe who uncovers a conspiracy in a magical city.

name: Galactic Empires
description: A sweeping science fiction saga chronicling the rise and fall of a star-spanning civilization.

name: Cupboard Organizer Set
description: A set of stackable organizers to maximize cupboard space. Includes bins of various sizes for versatile storage.

name: Smart Home Hub
description: A central hub to control all your smart home devices. Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant, and Apple HomeKit.

name: Eco-Friendly Water Bottle
description: A reusable water bottle made from sustainable materials. Keeps drinks cold for 24 hours and hot for 12 hours.

name: Wireless Earbuds Pro
description: High-fidelity wireless earbuds with noise cancellation and touch controls. Perfect for music lovers on the go.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: A sleek fitness tracker that monitors heart rate, sleep patterns, and daily activity. Syncs with your smartphone.

name: Solar Charger
description: A compact solar charger for your devices. Perfect for camping, hiking, or emergency situations.
